title: Drawing, "Festival given by the City of Paris on the occasion of the marriage of the Dauphin, later Louis XVI, and Marie Antoinette.", ca. 1770
medium: Pen and ink, brush and white gouache and watercolor.
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Festival given by the City of Paris on the occasion of the marriage of the Dauphin, later Louis XVI, and Marie Antoinette.", ca. 1770.
ca. 1770. Pen and ink, brush and white gouache and watercolor.. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1911-28-260.
